title: Sriracha Ramen Noodle Soup
description: A spicy ramen noodle soup spiked with sriracha hot sauce and ready in just 20 minutes!
directions: Add the sesame oil and sriracha to a large stockpot and bring to a simmer over medium-heat. Add the onion and tomato and cook for 4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the ginger, garlic, and seasonings; cook for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add 2 cups of water and transfer mixture to a blender or food processor and pulse until smooth. Return mixture to the pot and add the broth.
Bring to a simmer; add soy sauce and vinegar, and simmer for 8-10 minutes. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.

Add the ramen noodles to the broth and simmer for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the noodles have softened. Remove pan from heat, ladle soup into bowls, and top with scallions, cilantro, and eggs (if using). Enjoy!
